name: custom github pages domain
body:
### steps
1. go to https://github.com/kbatten
2. create new repo kbatten.github.io
3. add index.html
4. add CNAME to github
```
$ echo "pages.keithbatten.net" > ./CNAME
```
5. add CNAME "pages.keithbatten.net" -> "kbatten.github.io"
6. wait ...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
